snippet: Fans and photographers surround Ron Paul's car as he arrived for an event at Moe Joe's Family Restaurant in Manchester, N.H. He left abruptly after arriving.
abstract: Fans and photographers surround Ron Paul's car as he arrived for an event at Moe Joe's Family Restaurant in Manchester, N.H. He left abruptly after arriving.

headline.main: The Caucus Click: Surrounding Ron Paul
